channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Repeated fly tipping from residents, 2nd July
item.description:
Dead mouse on a trap. Constantly rubbish is being replenished the second its cleared. Please open the bag and evict whoever is throwing out their rubbish and causing a major rodent infestation. 4 mouse killed in days.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Marlborough Avenue, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tall overgrown fir tree intruding on pavement and cracked pavement, 2nd July
item.description:
There is a tall fir tree outside number 32 Sherborne Road which is overgrown and talking up more than half of the pavement and is causing an unsafe pavement as pavement is raised and cracked. This was reported repeatedly last summer and nothing has been done.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Sherborne Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Caravan plus fridge freezers, 2nd July
item.description:
Old Maidstone Rd Sidcup needs camera's. CTV will save council money Now abandoned caravan fridge freezers etc Every week fly tipping in this road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Maidstone Road, London

item.title: Road works on the pavement, 2nd July
item.description:
On Tuesday 1st July, roadworks were carried out on the pavement opposite my property. The original paving has been removed and replaced with tarmac, which I find very disappointing. It significantly worsens the appearance of the pavement, which was already in poor condition due to a lack of proper maintenance. This feels like a quick and careless fix. Given the amount we pay in council tax, I expect a much higher standard of upkeep for our roads and pavements.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 155, Baring Road, Chinbrook, Grove Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover in road beside roundabout, 2nd July
item.description:
The manhole cover is moving. Whenever the cover is driven over it makes a loud movement noise. It’s either loose and rocking from side to side or it’s out of position.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mayplace Road East, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Women keeps letting her dog foul and does not pick it up, 2nd July
item.description:
Women who lives on the Vickers green estate keeps letting her big dog pooh on our land and just walks away. It has been going on for about 2 months. we are a childrens centre and its just wrong

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Road, Barnes Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflow bins and smell in the heat, 2nd July
item.description:
These bins have been attracting foxes, who are hiding inbetween them & they bring clothes to nest in. During the heat the smell from the bins has been horrid, I live on this property & work from home & it's become unbearable now. Please can they be moved?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Millfields Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
